Conteudo: The Copom assessed the macroeconomic outlook and considered that, at the moment, the balance of risks to the prospective inflation trajectory still justifies an additional monetary stimulus. Therefore, the Committee unanimously decided to reduce the Selic rate to 11.25% p.a., without bias. The Committee will carefully monitor the evolution of the macroeconomic scenario until the next meeting, when it will define the next steps in its monetary policy strategy.The Portuguese version of the September Copom Minutes will be released next Thursday, September 13.
